page.title: 09THE AREA I LIKE BEST
page.content: The place I like best is{Christchurch {Quay}because it is a nice place to go for a walk in the summer.It is fairly quiet there with a nice atmosphere,I like the wildlife.I often go with younger cousins to feed the ducks and swans.It has a nice view.My grandad likes to fish there,while we walk around.In the summer there are plenty of people fishing or boating.There are a lot of amusements there for younger children,there is a playground and a paddling-pool,there is also a crazy-golf.There is a cafe with refreshments .Sometimes on the green a fair comes which is usually good fun.The old buildings are excellent fun,especially the ruins.It's great investigating them.My nan likes going to the{Quay}because there is a nice sweet shop nearby.
